sentence.text: Screening of drug candidates for their drug--drug interaction potential.
Within the past year, additional papers have been published that focus on higher-throughput drug-interaction screening
Some papers have described enzyme assays that can be used to evaluate inhibition or induction of the human cytochrome P450s
At the same time, numerous investigators have developed computational (in silico) methods to predict interactions and have validated the approach using in vitro (assay-derived) data
These so called 'in silico--in vitro' correlations have great potential and may complement existing 'in vitro--in vivo' correlations
